ai-patthana18.10:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings,)
ai-patthana18.10:1.1_0: For the sake of causes and conditions for the sake of causes.
ai-patthana18.10:2.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of cause or condition that gives rise to the reason.
ai-patthana18.10:3.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause or condition for the sake of causes and conditions.
